description: Navigate to 'Integrations' tab in WPForms settings to manage integrations.
Click '+ Add New Account' to integrate Zoho CRM with WPForms.
Enter email or mobile number and click 'Next' to sign in to Zoho.
Click 'Sign up now' to create a new Zoho account.
Click 'Accept' to allow WPForms to access Zoho CRM data.
Zoho CRM is successfully connected, indicated by 'Connected' status.
Click 'Add New Connection' to create a new Zoho CRM connection.
Enter a connection nickname and click 'OK' to save.
Select an account from the dropdown to establish Zoho CRM connection.
Select 'Create/Update Contact' from the action dropdown.
Fill in required fields for contact creation including Email and Name.
Click the tag icon to add a note to the Zoho CRM connection.
Map custom fields by selecting Zoho CRM fields and form field values.
Select 'Create/Update Lead' from the action dropdown for lead management.
Complete fields for lead creation including Email, Lead Name, and Company.
Click the tag icon to add a note to the lead information.
Map custom fields for leads by selecting Zoho CRM fields and form field values.
Select 'Delete Contact' from the action dropdown to remove a contact.
Enter the email for the contact to be deleted from Zoho CRM.
